text: Mangifera rufocostata (locally called asem kiat) is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo. ==References== rufocostata Category:Trees of Sumatra Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mangifera rufocostata
